title: cannot connect to client
body: wont let me login to the client, PVP.net Login Error!

replies.body:
Hey Wuks. I'm new to this 'thread' and 'asking for help' so I didn't know any other way to contact you. 
I'm experiencing patching difficulties since the latest patch 6.21 was released. Problem being 'Unexpected error check logs'.
Tried all night looking for solutions and that is when I found your 'page' you created to help with patching difficulties. 
I tried everything you mentioned there but nothing helped. Ultimately, i un-installed league and re-installed and that doesnt work either.
I feel really down at the moment since league is the only game I play. 
I REALLY HOPE YOU READ THIS MESSAGE! 
Help me Wuks!

There was a [service incident](http://forums.xfinity.com/t5/X1/TV-Service-Interruption-10-11-2016/td-p/2813767) that Comcast experienced that affected certain players across the US. It has been resolved by now, so if you're having issues still, please let me know so we can troubleshoot it together.

Hey Mclovinbam, 

It seems that there may be some Comcast/ISP-related issues at this time. Can you provide more information about what ISP you're using and what geographical location you're in (ie. Northern California)?
I'm using Comcast and I live in the bay area
